1.title: Intro
1.content: You may simply need a single, brief answer without discussion. Other times, you may want to talk through a scenario, evaluate how well a group is learning new material or solicit feedback. The types of questions you ask directly impact the type of answer you receive.

2.title: Input
2.content: You may simply need a single, brief answer without discussion. Other times, you may want to talk through a scenario, evaluate how well a group is learning new material or solicit feedback. The types of questions you ask directly impact the type of answer you receive.
